name: Inter(art)
description:
Have you ever wanted to get into a painting? Have you ever asked yourself how the world of the painting would be? This game allows you to make that, a reallity. A whole galery with all kind of arts, and you can touch anything and enter to it's world, to see the perspective of the artist, as him sees it. What are you waiting for? 

Feel, Life, the art.

This is a demo, that shows only the concept of the idea.

Created by Álvaro Cedillo and Javier Sánchez.
